name: Bouncy Time
description:
"I wish we wake up like this everyday!"

Inspired by choreography of Issey Miyake's Spring 2020 Collection showcase. https://www.isseymiyake.com/en/news/5320. 

To run the game, please allow access to the camera.

Press lower right corner's "Play" button to start the game. (If you didn't see the button, try full screen the game.) You may want to step back until you can see above your waist for the complete experience. 

Has music(music credit to the showcase DJ)! Enjoy~

Made for Prototype Studio Week 11
